original_text: And the ten horns that you saw, they and the beast will hate the prostitute. They will make her desolate and naked, and devour her flesh and burn her up with fire,
korean_text: 네가 본 바 이 열 뿔과 짐승은 음녀를 미워하여 망하게 하고 벌거벗게 하고 그의 살을 먹고 불로 아주 사르리라

sentences.original_text: And the ten horns that you saw
they and the beast will hate the prostitute
They will make her desolate and naked
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그녀를 황폐하고 벌거벗게 만들 것이며

sentences.original_text: and burn her up with fire
